alert.note: Alert for McPherson; Saline (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 11:50PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Gusty outflow winds ahead of thunderstorms will impact portions of McPherson and Saline Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1148 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking an outflow boundary along a line extending from near Ada to 5 miles south of Little River tracking well ahead of thunderstorms in the area. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Salina, Mcpherson, Lindsborg, Moundridge, Inman, Galva, Canton, Marquette, Assaria, Gypsum, Brookville, Smolan, Windom, New Cambria, Falun, Glendale, Salina Airport, Mcpherson Airport, Roxbury and Bridgeport. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 43 and 95. Interstate 70 between Mile Markers 236 and 266. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for central and south central Kansas.
